content.question: Which characteristic of the Lenape bandolier bags reflects an influence from an outside culture?

choices.label: The curvilinear and plantlike patterns mimic design styles popular in American quilts.
The shape of the bags was inspired by those carried by European soldiers to store ammunition.
The decorative beads increasingly came from China through overseas trade routes.
The bags became smaller to imitate European and American fashion trends.

content.answer: The shape of the bags was inspired by those carried by European soldiers to store ammunition.
